DataElement.preferredName: Patient International Neuroblastoma Risk Group Classification System Stage
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information regarding patient with neuroblastoma disease in classification system developed to establish a consensus approach for pretreatment risk stratification of neuroblastomas.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient International Neuroblastoma Risk Group Classification System Stage
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A classification system developed to establish a consensus approach for pretreatment risk stratification of neuroblastomas._Any distinct time period in a sequence of events.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredName: International Neuroblastoma Risk Group Classification System Stage
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A classification system developed to establish a consensus approach for pretreatment risk stratification of neuroblastomas._The extent of a cancer in the body. Staging is usually based on the size of the tumor, whether lymph nodes contain cancer, and whether the cancer has spread from the original site to other parts of the body.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: INRG stage L1 or L2 neuroblastoma with metastatic disease confined to the skin and/or liver and/or bone marrow.

Concepts.definition: INRG stage L1 or L2 neuroblastoma with metastatic disease confined to the skin and/or liver and/or bone marrow.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Neuroblastoma with distant metastatic disease (except MS).

Concepts.definition: Neuroblastoma with distant metastatic disease (except MS).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Locoregional neuroblastoma with one or more image defined risk factors (IDRFs).

Concepts.definition: Locoregional neuroblastoma with one or more image defined risk factors (IDRFs).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Locoregional neuroblastoma without image defined risk factors (IDRFs).

Concepts.definition: Locoregional neuroblastoma without image defined risk factors (IDRFs).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.
